BizTek 2020

Thursday February 13 2020
Fort Garry Canad Inns
Buy Tickets!

Get Your Tickets Here!

Registration Opening Soon

BizTek 2020 is MISA’s biggest networking event of the year! We’re bringing many companies looking to network with students in MIS as well as students that have a general interest in technology!

This event will showcase networking opportunities with business professionals, speaker presentations from companies, and a keynote speaker! Food & drinks served by Canad Inns Catering.

Event Information

  • When is it?

    Thursday, February 13, 2020, 5:30 pm - 9:30 pm

  • Who is it for?

    Students, Graduates, Alumni, and Professionals

  • Where is it?

    Fort Garry Canad Inns; 1824 Pembina Hwy Ambassador Room F

  • Additional Information

    Dress Code: Business Professional
